name: ctemplate
summary: Powerful but simple template language for C++.
prepare_command:
TOOLCHAIN="`xcode-select -p`/Toolchains/XcodeDefault.xctoolchain/usr/bin"
export CXXFLAGS="-stdlib=libstdc++ -std=gnu++11"
export LDFLAGS="-lstdc++ -stdlib=libstdc++"
export CC=${TOOLCHAIN}/clang
export CXX=${TOOLCHAIN}/clang++
./configure && make src/htmlparser/htmlparser_fsm.h && make src/htmlparser/jsparser_fsm.h
